about.whoAreWeText: With extensive and long experience in the Albanian and regional market as a patented manufacturer for 18 years by international institutions, EMKO has built a respected name and a long history of success. We offer a wide range of office and educational institution furniture products, designed and manufactured according to the highest quality standards, also tailored to the specific needs of each client. For us, every client is important and your requirements are our priority. By choosing us, you will benefit not only from the quality of our products but also from excellent service and support that you deserve.
about.visionText: Our vision is to be a leader in both the Albanian and international furniture market by offering products of the highest quality and unmatched aesthetic value.
about.missionText: Our mission is to meet the needs and demands of our clients by emphasizing our company values: accuracy, quality, and professionalism.
about.value1Text: At EMKO, we focus on every detail of planning and coordination to ensure that our clients experience a high level of accuracy in every order delivered. EMKO is a manufacturer that easily adapts to your specific design and requirements. With an unwavering commitment to fulfilling your needs, we ensure that products are delivered on time and within the designated timeframe.
about.value2Text: Our products are innovative and efficient in complementing your spaces. Our collaboration with renowned international partners, including well-known Italian partners, allows us to bring the latest and most innovative furniture solutions to the market. This blend of our 25-year experience with patents and international expertise ensures that you receive the best products for your needs.
about.value3Text: One of our strong points is our unwavering commitment to quality and customer service. With the UNE-EN-ISO 9001/08 quality certificate, we demonstrate our dedication to manufacturing and providing high-quality products. Our professional team is always available to offer technical assistance and solutions for any furniture needs.

certifications.title: Our Certifications
certifications.subtitle: EMKO is proud to hold various international certifications that demonstrate our commitment to quality, safety, and environmental responsibility.

contact.formSubtitle: Fill out the form now and we will contact you within the next 24 hours!

products.productsDescription: Discover our wide range of furniture solutions designed for various institutional needs. From office spaces to educational environments, we have the perfect furniture to meet your requirements.

projects.noImages: No images available for this project.
projects.description: Explore Emko's completed projects and see our work in action.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.introductionText: Welcome to Emko. We value your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal information. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our website and use our services.
privacyPolicy.informationWeCollectText: We may collect various types of information to provide and improve our services to you.
privacyPolicy.personalData: Personal Data: Identifiable information such as your name, email address, phone number, and mailing address.
privacyPolicy.usageData: Usage Data: Information on how you access and use our website, including your IP address, browser type, pages visited, and time spent on pages.
privacyPolicy.cookies: Cookies and Tracking Data: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to track activity on our website and store certain information.
privacyPolicy.marketingData: Marketing and Communications Data: Your preferences in receiving marketing from us and your communication preferences.
privacyPolicy.howWeUseText: We use the collected data for various purposes:
privacyPolicy.toProvideService: To Provide and Maintain Our Service
privacyPolicy.informationSharingText: We may share your information in the following circumstances:
privacyPolicy.cookiesText: We use cookies to track activity on our website and store certain information. Cookies help us improve your browsing experience by remembering your preferences and understanding how you use our site.
privacyPolicy.dataSecurityText: We implement various security measures to maintain the safety of your personal information. However, no method of transmission over the Internet or electronic storage is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee its absolute security.
privacyPolicy.yourRightsText: Depending on your location, you may have the following rights regarding your personal data:
privacyPolicy.changesText: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page. You are advised to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes.
privacyPolicy.contactUsText: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us:
privacyPolicy.address: Address: Vaqarr, Lalm mbas AnOil, Tirana

productsSection.sectionDescription: Discover our wide range of furniture solutions designed for various institutional needs. From office spaces to educational environments, we have the perfect furniture to meet your requirements.

cookieConsent.text: We use cookies to enhance your browsing experience, serve personalized ads or content, and analyze our traffic. By clicking "Accept", you consent to our use of cookies. You can learn more in our "Privacy Policy".

errorPage.title: Oops! Something went wrong.

home.title: Where everything comes together
home.description: With 18 years of expertise in crafting high-quality office and educational furniture, EMKO blends innovation, precision, and personalized service to transform your workspace.

about.title: Discover EMKO
about.description: For 18 years, EMKO has built a respected legacy in the Albanian and regional market as a patented manufacturer. We provide tailor-made, high-quality furniture solutions, placing every client’s needs at the heart of what we do.

products.title: Our Products
products.description: Explore our innovative range of office and educational furniture, designed and manufactured to meet the highest quality standards and your specific requirements.

projects.title: Our Projects
projects.description: Discover our successful projects – including the renowned EMKO Slider – that highlight our dedication to innovation, quality, and aesthetic excellence.

certifications.title: Certifications
certifications.description: Our commitment to accuracy, quality, and professionalism is validated by international standards, including the UNE-EN-ISO 9001/08 certification.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.description: Reach out to learn more about how EMKO’s tailored, high-quality furniture solutions can elevate your workspace.
